gameDetails.name: Codenames: Bonus Pack – Board Gaming (English)
gameDetails.description:
Found in Spielbox Issue 1-2017 English Edition. Also came with Game Boy Geek 2018 Kickstarter Family Pack.

Bonus Pack contains 10 double-sided cards with terms based on typical board gaming words and lingo.

Euro/Family
Roleplay/Chance
Mini/Author
Expansion/Strategy
Geek/Cube
Tile/Party
Turn/Review
Loss/Token
Illustrator/Victory
Analysis/Paralysis
